definition: (rugby) the player in the middle of the front row of the scrum who tries to capture the ball with the foot
details:
noun
- (rugby) the player in the middle of the front row of the scrum who tries to capture the ball with the foot
- a golfer whose shots typically curve left (for right-handed golfers)
- a prostitute who attracts customers by walking the streets
= synonyms: hustler, slattern, streetwalker, street girl, floozy, floozie
